<pre><code>ReadLock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  ++waiting_readers;
  while (writers != 0) {
    cond_wait(&amp;ok_to_read_cv, &amp;lock);
  }
  --waiting_readers;
  ++readers;
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}

ReadUnlock() {

::: {.column width="45%"}
 
<pre><code>WriteLock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  while (<span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">waiting_readers +</span>
         readers + writers != 0) {
    cond_wait(&amp;ok_to_write_cv);
  }
  ++writers;
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}
WriteUnlock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  --writers;
  if (readers == 0 &amp;&amp; waiting_readers == 0) {
    cond_signal(&amp;ok_to_write_cv);
  } else {
    cond_broadcast(&amp;ok_to_read_cv);
  }
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}
</code></pre>
